sense.def:
To fix something somewhere
pomeni nekaj trdno in varno nekam pritrditi ali dati.

seg.quote: He had the sign fixed to the gate.
She fixed a jewelled brooch on her dress.

sense.def:
To fix one's eyes or attention on something
pomeni nekaj gledati ali o nečem razmišljati v popolni zbranosti.

seg.quote: She fixed her brown eyes on him.

sense.def:
To fix the date or amount of something
pomeni natančno določiti in opredeliti, kateri datum ali kolikšna količina nečesa bo.

seg.quote: All that remained was to fix the date of the wedding.

sense.def:
To fix something
pomeni nekaj popraviti.

seg.quote: I learned how to fix radios in the Army.

sense.def:
To fix someone a drink or some food
pomeni nekomu pripraviti pijačo ali hrano;

seg.quote: Would you like me to fix you a drink?

sense.def:
A fix
je injekcija narkotika, na primer heroina;

To fix someone up with something
pomeni nekomu priskrbeti nekaj, kar potrebuje.

seg.quote: They told me that they could fix me up with tickets.

sense.def:
To fix something up
pomeni nekaj pripraviti.

seg.quote: The holiday is all fixed up.
